mean_cn: n. 有缺点毛病的人；  adj. 不完善的，有缺陷的
mean_en: having a problem or fault that prevents something from working correctly :having a defect or flaw
word_etyma: de 加强意义 + fect 背叛，背离 + ive 形容词后缀 有...性质的→ adj. 有缺陷的；不完美的
sentence: This computer must be defective! It never works correctly!
sentence_trans: 这台电脑一定坏了！它从不正常运行！
